column1: Baby Barnaby's////Now to talk about the food.. Do yourself a favor and order the green eggs! My life is forever changed. I was visiting Houston for a few days and have been dreaming about this dish ever since. The eggs are scrambled with cheese
column3: and spinach (hence "green" eggs) and the combination of these ingredients makes for a perfectly seasoned and flavor egg dish. The eggs are served with chicken apple sausages
column5: and half a plate full of breakfast potatoes! The potatoes are well seasoned and crispy but there were so many that I couldn't finish them.
